title.rendered: Time to Say Good-bye to Your Junk Car

content.rendered:
Do you have an old car that has been sitting in your driveway, collecting dust and being nothing but a hindrance? It may be time to sell your junk car for cash!
 

It’s time to get rid of your car when:

  • The vehicle is no longer an asset, but rather a liability.
  • You’re unable to find a buyer to take it off your hands.
  • It was totaled in an accident and has been written off.
  • It has little to no trade-in value.
  • It’s a lemon that you don’t want to pass of to someone else.
  • You don’t want to go through the hassle of selling it.
  • It costs more to fix than it’s worth.
  • It no longer functions the way you would like it to.

 
Whether your car runs or not, we want it. We have same day pick-up for your vehicle, and will give you cash on the spot. We pay the highest prices for junk cars in Chicago, so give us a call today!
